name: Laverne HARRIS; Elizabeth Clark; Gary Christopher; Derrick Bostic, Appellants v. Edward G. RENDELL, Governor of Pennsylvania and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees

parties: Laverne HARRIS; Elizabeth Clark; Gary Christopher; Derrick Bostic, Appellants v. Edward G. RENDELL, Governor of Pennsylvania and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
992 A.2d 121
Laverne HARRIS; Elizabeth Clark; Gary Christopher; Derrick Bostic, Appellants v. Edward G. RENDELL, Governor of Pennsylvania and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2010.
